content.question: Assume an economy is in long-run equilibrium and the central bank engages in an expansionary monetary policy for a prolonged time period. If the velocity of money is constant, which of the following is true according to the quantity theory of money?

choices.label: The governmentâ€™s budget deficit will increase.
Price level will increase at the same rate as the money supply.
Real output will exceed full employment in the long run.
The actual unemployment rate will exceed the natural rate of unemployment.
The production possibilities curve will shift inward.

content.answer: Price level will increase at the same rate as the money supply.
